title: Movie font
content:
Hello,

Please could somebody help me to find out the name of these fonts? Thanks so much.

Alicia

author: younglust

comments.content:
"Psycho" - hand drawn, Compacta is close.  
"Poltergeist" - Helvetica (outlined).  
"Tierra..." - Impact I think.

- Lex
